channel.title: The U.S. Senate Class of 1971
channel.description:
This year, eleven freshman--five Republicans, five Democrats and one conservative--joined the ranks of the 100 and America's upper house of the legislative branch of government. This series interviews each of the incoming senators.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: #9 Senator Lowell P. Weicker Jr.
item.description: This program features an interview with incoming Republican senator Lowell P. Weicker Jr., representing the state of Connecticut.
item.dc:creator: National Educational Radio Network
item.dc:subject: U.S. Politics

item.title: #5 Senator John Tunney
item.description: This program features an interview with incoming Democratic senator John V. Tunney, representing the state of California.
item.dc:creator: National Educational Radio Network
item.dc:subject: U.S. Politics

item.description: This program features an interview with incoming Republican senator J. Glenn Beall Jr., representing the state of Maryland.
